column1: # OWASP ZAP scan rule configuration for BMHQ
# Common false positives for SPAs are set to WARN instead of FAIL
# CSP header — configure properly in production, not a blocker in dev
# X-Content-Type-Options — add to production nginx config
# Cookie without SameSite — review in production
# Server header disclosure — strip in production reverse proxy
# Timestamp disclosure — common in API responses, not a real vulnerability
# Modern web app info — SPA detection, not a vulnerability
# User agent fuzzer — expected behavior for API
# Re-examine cache control — SPAs handle caching differently
# Permissions policy header — configure in production
